title: La proporción áurea
author: Mario Livio
description: "En La proporción áurea Mario Livio nos ofrece un maravilloso trampolín al asombroso mundo de las matemáticas y a su relación con el mundo físico desde la antigüedad hasta el día de hoy." -Roger Penrose,
location: Facultad de Matematicas, Universidad de Sevilla

title: What is Mathematics?
author: Herbert Robbins Richard Courant (Ian Stewart)
description: A discussion of fundamental mathematical principles from algebra to elementary calculus designed to promote constructive mathematical reasoning.

title: Writing Effective Use Cases
author: Alistair Cockburn
description: This guide will help readers learn how to employ the significant power of use cases to their software development efforts. It provides a practical methodology, presenting key use case concepts.
